column2: "A new Matter Board has been formed. The present teeters between reality and truth."
"The universe is constantly changing, and your role in it is extensive."
"That is something that I and We know, and something you must acknowledge."
"And yet, you must not forget that what you see is not the only reality; there is never only one truth."
"Hidden realities become poison and prevent the pursuit of truth. You must not falter in moving forward."
"What you seek is not a single thing. You must piece it together."
"I and We trust in the ends that you must realize."
"You must trust in yourself, for what you have done and what you have yet to do."
